resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
Check your email inbox for the verification code and enter it here. \n Please note, it could take a couple minutes to arrive and could be in the spam folder.

I am writing regarding a:
 [ ] Feature Request
 [ ] General Feedback / Bug Report
 
 Description:
 (Please describe your request or issue here)
 
 
 --------------------------------------------------
 User Account: %3$s
 Device Info (Auto-filled):
 Model: %1$s
 Android Version: %2$s
 --------------------------------------------------
 
 P.S. If this is positive feedback, I will definitely consider rating Speakify on the Google Play Store!
